body:
Files: compiler/js-operator.h and compiler/js-operator.cc
Operators for with-scope/context and lookup:
- const Operator* JSOperatorBuilder::CreateWithContext(ScopeInfoRef scope_info): defines IrOpcode::kJSCreateWithContext; input arity includes object + context; name "JSCreateWithContext".
- ScopeInfoRef ScopeInfoOf(const Operator* op): used to extract scope info for CreateWith/Catch/Block.
- Context ops: LoadContext(depth,index,immutable), LoadScriptContext(depth,index), StoreContext(depth,index), StoreScriptContext(depth,index); JSHasContextExtension(depth) operator. These are used by BGB for fast paths.
- Global ops: LoadGlobal(NameRef, FeedbackSource, TypeofMode), StoreGlobal(LanguageMode, NameRef, FeedbackSource).
- ToObject operator definition: const Operator* ToObject(); cached with Operator::kFoldable.
- JS operator node wrappers exist for context operators and CreateWithContext (JSCreateWithContext appears in opcodes and builder).
Key constant strings: JSOperatorBuilder::CreateWithContext in js-operator.cc around line ~1505 constructs Operator for IrOpcode::kJSCreateWithContext, name "JSCreateWithContext".
explanation: This captures JS operator definitions for CreateWithContext and the various context load/store operations used by BytecodeGraphBuilder and lowering, as requested.
